_json.title: How Rainwater Harvesting Transformed My Front Yard Garden
_json.gridTitle: How Rainwater Harvesting Transformed My Front Yard Garden
_json.description: Why send rainwater to the sewer when I can harvest and hold it on site to use for free irrigation? Allowing permaculture principles to inform the design process, I set out to create a closed-loop system to hopefully harvest rainwater from the roof to reduce the number of times I have to drag out the hose and pay to water the garden. Learn how harvesting rainwater from my roof helped me transform the front yard garden on my suburban homestead.
